BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, the administrative code of the city of New York and local law number 58 for the year 1996, relating to performance by the police department of certain functions previously performed by the department of transportation, in relation to authorizing employees of the police department to perform parking enforcement functions.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
